src\\components\\clip.pasteYoutubeVideo: Paste YouTube video ID or URL

src\\components\\filemanagertoolbar.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop exported database file here to import.

src\\components\\groupcard.directTooltip: Direct mode: hold down switch to play
src\\components\\groupcard.latchedTooltip: Latched mode: press switch to start playback, which continues until all clips have played
src\\components\\groupcard.promptModePlays: 'Prompt' mode plays clips from another switch at full volume.
src\\components\\groupcard.standardTooltip: Standard mode: press switch to play next clip

src\\components\\keybindingbutton.tooltip: Hold while pressing the key to use for the switch

src\\components\\presenter.alreadyPlayingA:
Already playing a clip. Change talkover mode to allow
      interruption/talk-over.
src\\components\\presenter.toUsePromptscan:
To use Prompt/Scan mode, set one switch to 'Scan' with a list of clips to
      scan through at low volume, and another to 'Prompt' to trigger playback of
      the selected clip at full volume
